# 魔鬼交涉术

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/mogui-jiaosheshu
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/mogui-jiaosheshu
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install mogui-jiaosheshu
mogui-jiaosheshu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g mogui-jiaosheshu
mogui-jiaosheshu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
